metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, and manage activity stream posts with various content types and privacy settings

steps.expected: Activity Stream editor should be visible
steps.actual: Activity Stream editor visible with 'Tell the world something...' placeholder

steps.action: Click on editor and enter text 'This is a test post created for Post Creation and Management testing'
steps.expected: Text should appear in the editor
steps.actual: Text appeared in editor with Share button visible

steps.expected: Post should be created and appear in the feed
steps.actual: Post created successfully and appears at top of feed

steps.action: Enter text with emojis: 'Testing emoji post: (party) (fire) (rocket) Great success!'
steps.expected: Text with emoji codes should appear in editor
Post with emojis should be created
steps.actual: Post created with emojis rendered correctly as graphical icons

steps.action: Enter text with special characters: '<>&"'@#$%^*(){}[]|\;:?,./~`+- cafe resume'

steps.expected: Post with special characters should be created and displayed correctly
steps.actual: Post created successfully. Special characters including HTML entities (<>&) are properly escaped and displayed as text. Unicode characters (n, cafe, resume) render correctly with copyright symbol

steps.action: Enter malicious script: '<script>alert("XSS")</script> Test HTML injection'
steps.expected: Text should be accepted in editor
steps.actual: XSS attempt text entered in editor

steps.expected: Script tags should be sanitized/stripped, only safe text displayed
steps.actual: Post created showing only 'Test HTML injection' - script tags were completely stripped by HTML sanitization. No JavaScript execution occurred.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create post with maximum character limit

steps.action: Enter 353-character text exceeding the default 250-character limit
steps.expected: System should either reject, truncate, or accept the long text
steps.actual: Long text (353 chars) entered in editor without any client-side validation

steps.expected: Post should be handled according to system settings
steps.actual: Post created successfully with full 353-character content displayed. No truncation or rejection. Posts appear to have no strict character limit.

steps.action: Click on editor to activate it, leave empty, click Share
steps.expected: System should validate and prevent empty post creation
steps.actual: Empty editor shown with Share button visible

steps.action: Click Share without entering any text
steps.expected: Validation error should appear preventing empty post
steps.actual: Empty post was created and appears in feed with no content (only username and timestamp visible). No validation prevented the empty submission.

issues: System allows creation of empty posts with no content validation. Users can submit posts without any text, resulting in empty entries in the activity feed.

steps.action: Click Remove link on a post
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' and Yes/No buttons

steps.expected: Post should be removed from the feed
steps.actual: Post deleted successfully and removed from the activity feed

observations: Code review shows MaxCharacters setting defaults to 250, but this appears to apply only to comments, not posts. Posts accept longer content without restriction.
HTML sanitization uses Utilities.FilterMaliciousTags() which successfully strips script tags and other malicious HTML
SecuritySet values support: E=Everyone, C=Community, F=Friends, U=User/Private, R=Group - but privacy settings UI was not visible in the basic post editor
The Edit post functionality was not found in the UI during testing. Each post shows Like, Comment, Subscribe/Unsubscribe, Remove, and Pin options, but no Edit option was visible.
